flawed_nl_solution:
Maria plans on having 40 * 20/100 = <<40*20/100=200/1>>200/1 more stamps in her collection.
This means she wants to have 40 + 200/1 = <<40+200/1=240>>240 stamps.
#### 240

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 200/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
